question: What is the mount point?
options: ['a) an empty directory at which the mounted file system will be attached', 'b) a location where every time file systems are mounted', 'c) is the time when the mounting is done', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) an empty directory at which the mounted file system will be attached
option2: b) a location where every time file systems are mounted
option3: c) is the time when the mounting is done

question: When a file system is mounted over a directory that is not empty then _____________
options: ['a) the system may not allow the mount', 'b) the system must allow the mount', 'c) the system may allow the mount and the directory’s existing files will then be made obscure', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) the system may not allow the mount
option2: b) the system must allow the mount
option3: c) the system may allow the mount and the directory’s existing files will then be made obscure

question: In UNIX, exactly which operations can be executed by group members and other users is definable by _____________
options: ['a) the group’s head', 'b) the file’s owner', 'c) the file’s permissions', 'd) all of the mentioned']

question: A process _____ lower the priority of another process if both are owned by the same owner
options: ['a) must', 'b) can', 'c) cannot', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: In distributed file system  ________________ directories are visible from the local machine
In the world wide web, a ____ is needed to gain access to the remote files, and separate operations are used to transfer files
Anonymous access allows a user to transfer files _____________
options: ['a) without having an account on the remote system', 'b) only if he accesses the system with a guest account', 'c) only if he has an account on the remote system', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) without having an account on the remote system
option2: b) only if he accesses the system with a guest account
option3: c) only if he has an account on the remote system
explanation: The world wide web uses anonymous file exchange almost exclusively.

question: The machine containing the files is the _______ and the machine wanting to access the files is the ______
options: ['a) master, slave', 'b) memory, user', 'c) server, client', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: Distributed naming services/Distributed information systems have been devised to _____________
options: ['a) provide information about all the systems', 'b) provide unified access to the information needed for remote computing', 'c) provide unique names to all systems in a network', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) provide information about all the systems
option2: b) provide unified access to the information needed for remote computing
option3: c) provide unique names to all systems in a network

question: Domain name system provides _____________
options: ['a) host-name-to-network-address translations for the entire internet', 'b) network-address-to-host-name translations for the entire internet', 'c) binary to hex translations for the entire internet', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) host-name-to-network-address translations for the entire internet
option2: b) network-address-to-host-name translations for the entire internet
option3: c) binary to hex translations for the entire internet

question: To recover from failures in the network operations _____________ information may be maintained
options: ['a) ip address', 'b) state', 'c) stateless', 'd) operating system']

question: The series of accesses between the open and close operations is a _____________
